base_character.name: chibi_redjacket
base_character.base_prompt: masterpiece, best quality, anime game character, chibi style but well-proportioned, single character only, full body, standing, idle pose, centered composition, symmetrical body, clear silhouette, cute but detailed face, large expressive eyes, short black hair, simple straight hairstyle, wearing a red jacket, blue pants, white sneakers, clean outfit design suitable for customization, flat colors, clean shading, minimal gradients, clear lineart, consistent anatomy, neutral expression, plain light background

negative_prompt: lowres, worst quality, blurry, jpeg artifacts, pixelated, mosaic, broken pixels, anti-aliasing, soft edges, painterly, multiple characters, duplicate body, extra limbs, bad anatomy, deformed body, big head tiny body, cropped, out of frame, dynamic pose, action pose, over-rendered, realistic texture, heavy shadows
